name: outline-block
description: Automatic table of contents generator with multiple positioning options, styles, and interactive features. Perfect for long-form content, documentation, and articles.
author: PayloadKit
features: 2 content source modes: auto-detect from page content or manual items
Automatic heading extraction from customizable content selectors
Support for H1-H6 heading levels with configurable inclusion
4 positioning options: inline, sticky-left, sticky-right, floating
5 visual styles: simple, card, pills, numbered, dots
Smooth scrolling animation with customizable offset
Reading progress indicator with visual progress bar
Auto-hide on mobile devices for better UX
4 color themes: default, primary, neutral, dark
3 font sizes and 3 spacing options for customization
Exclude selectors to skip specific headings
Automatic ID generation for headings without IDs
Custom CSS injection for advanced styling
TypeScript interfaces for complete type safety
Accessibility features with proper ARIA labels
usage: Essential for documentation sites, blog articles, long-form content, tutorials, and any page where users need quick navigation to different sections.

preview.description: Interactive table of contents with scroll tracking

setup.dependencies: Make sure you have Lucide React and Tailwind CSS configured in your project.
setup.components: This component is client-side only and uses browser APIs for content detection and scroll tracking.
setup.content: For auto-detection mode, ensure your content has proper heading structure (H1-H6) and is wrapped in containers matching your content selectors.
